## Textarea

Extends HTML `<textarea>`

If only an `id` property is supplied, then `name` will assume the same value.

## Usage Example

```JSX
<Textarea />
```

---

## Props:

* [size](#size)

### size

| Required? | Type | Default | Options |
|:---:|:---:|---|---|
| no | string | | `['lg', 'sm']` |

Sets the size of the input
